sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
#app
    .buttona
    .outlineDate {{ date }}
    .noteDaka {{ note }}
    .timeDaka {{ currentTime }}
    
    .dakaed
        .dakatitle {{ dakatitle.name }} &nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp {{ dakatitle.stime }} &nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp {{dakatitle.sstime}} &nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp {{ dakatitle.worktime }}
        .dakadata {{ dakadata.name }} &nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp {{ dakadata.stime }} &nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp {{dakadata.sstime}} &nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp&nbsp {{ dakadata.worktime }}
        .dakaTime {{ currentTimeda }}
        .dakaedTime(v-if="dakaed") {{ currentTimesh }}&nbsp&nbsp {{ du }}
        .buttoned(@click="function(){updateCurrentTime();wh(); dakaed=!dakaed}") {{ buttoned }}

</template>

<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            date: '',
            currentTime: '',
            note: '勇威，昨晚睡得好嗎？',
            currentTimeda:'',
            currentTimesh:'',
            buttoned:'下班',
            workhours:'',
            du:'',
            sh:'',
            da:'',
            dakaed: false,
            dakatitle: {
                name: '姓名',
                stime: '上班時間',
                sstime: '下班時間',
                worktime: '工時',
            },
            dakadata: {
                name: '何勇威',
                stime: '',
                sstime: '',
                worktime: ''
            }
        }
    },
    
    methods: {
        updateCurrentTimeTop() {
            var moment = require('moment'); 
            moment().format();
            this.currentTime = moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
            this.date = moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD ddd")
        },
        updateCurrentTime() {

            var moment = require('moment'); 
            // moment().format();
            this.sh = moment();
            this.currentTimesh = this.sh.format('HH:mm:ss');
            // window.alert('c8 c8 ')            

        
        },
        updateCurrentTime2(){
            var moment = require('moment'); 
            // moment().format();
            this.da = moment();
            this.currentTimeda = this.da.format('HH:mm:ss');
        },

        wh() {
            var moment = require('moment'); 
            var du = moment.utc(this.sh.diff(this.da)).format('HH:mm:ss');
            this.du = du;
            // console.log(a)
        }
        // updateCurrentTime2(currentTimesh, callback) {
        //     this.dakaed = true;
        //     var moment = require('moment'); 
        //     moment().format();
        //     this.currentTimesh = moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
        //     return currentTimesh
            // this.workhours = moment.duration(this.currentTimesh.diff(this.currentTimeda, 'HH'));
            // hours = duration.ashours();
            // console.log("11111");
            // m1 = moment(this.currentTimeda);
            // m2 = moment(this.currentTimesh);
            
        // },
        // wh () {
        //     var moment = require('moment'); 
        //     moment().format();
        //     // var currentTimeda = moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
        //     // var currentTimesh = moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
        //     var du = this.du
        //     this.du = moment(moment.duration(currentTimesh - currentTimeda)).format('HH:mm:ss');
        //     console.log("222")
        // }
    },
    
    created() {
        this.updateCurrentTime2();
        setInterval(() => this.updateCurrentTimeTop(), 1 * 1000);
        
        // var dakaed = false;
        // this.updateCurrentTime2();
    },
}






    

</script>

<style lang="sass">
// *
//     position: relative
//     font-family: Times, 微軟正黑體
//     width: 100%
//     height: 100%
//     margin: 0

body
    background-color: #333
    position: relative
    width: 100%
    height: 100%

.outlineDate
    width: 500px
    font-size: 20px
    display: inline-block
    float: left
    position: absolute
    color: #A78E70
    text-align: center
    left: 50%
    margin-left: -250px
    font-family: Teko
    -webkit-text-stroke: 1px #fff
    font-weight: bold
    top:  28%

.dakatitle
    // border: solid 1px white
    color: #fff
    position: absolute
    top: 42%
    left: 45%
    width: 300px
    height: 23px
    text-align: center
    margin-left: -125px
    // margin-top: -125px
    display: inline-block

.dakadata
    color: #fff
    position: absolute
    top: 47%
    left: 35.5%
    width: 300px
    height: 23px
    text-align: center
    margin-left: -125px
    // margin-top: -125px
    display: inline-block

.dakaTime
    // border: solid 1px black 
    color: #fff
    font-size: 18px
    position: absolute
    top: 47%
    left: 37.5%

.dakaedTime
    // border: solid 1px black 
    color: #fff
    font-size: 18px
    position: absolute
    top: 47%
    left: 51%

.buttoned
    position: absolute
    font-weigt: bold
    width: 100px
    height: 100px
    border-radius: 100%
    // display: inline-block
    // justify-content: center
    // vertical-align: middle
    left: 85%
    // margin: auto
    margin-left: -50px 
    margin-top: -50px
    line-height: 100px
    text-align: center
    color: #ffffff
    background-color: #333333
    // float: left
    top: 50%
    // margin-top: 170px
    cursor: pointer

</style>
